attacks.name: Roaring Flames
attacks.text: Discard all Fire Energy cards attached to Blaine's Charizard. If all Energy cards attached to Blaine's Charizard provide 2 Fire Energy, discard all of them. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire Energy discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Flame Jet
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for this attack. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)

name: Charizard

abilities.name: Fury Blaze
abilities.text: If your opponent has 3 or less Prize cards left, each of Charizard's attacks does 50 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Blast Burn
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard. If tails, discard 4 Energy cards attached to Charizard. (If you can't, this attack does nothing.)

flavorText: It is said that CHARIZARD's fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.

abilities.name: Fire Formation
abilities.text: Each of Charizard's attacks does 10 more damage for each Fire Pokémon on your Bench to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Burning Tail
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Charizard.

name: Charizard

abilities.name: Energy Burn
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard in order to use this attack.

flavorText: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to unintentionally cause forest fires.

name: Charizard

abilities.name: Energy Burn
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard or this attack does nothing.

flavorText: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to unintentionally cause forest fires.

name: Charizard

attacks.name: Wild Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 50 damage to itself.

flavorText: When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.

name: Charizard

abilities.name: Resolute Flame
abilities.text: This Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon for each of their Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX in play.

attacks.name: Fiery Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

flavorText: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

name: Charizard

abilities.name: Energy Burn
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard in order to use this attack.

flavorText: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to unintentionally cause forest fires.

name: Dark Charizard

attacks.name: Continuous Fireball
attacks.text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Fire Energy cards attached to Dark Charizard. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads. Discard a number of Fire Energy cards attached to Dark Charizard equal to the number of heads.

flavorText: Seemingly possessed, it spews fire like a volcano, trying to burn all it sees.

name: Charizard δ
rules: This Pokémon is both Lightning Metal type.

abilities.name: Peal of Thunder
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play Charizard from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose as many Energy cards as you like, and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Discard the other cards.

attacks.name: Metal Burn
attacks.text: Discard all Metal Energy attached to Charizard.

name: Charizard-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz-GX
attacks.text: (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Charizard-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Roaring Resolve
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on this Pokémon. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Continuous Blaze Ball
attacks.text: Discard all Fire Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

flavorText: When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.

abilities.name: Burning Energy
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all basic Energy attached to all of your Pokémon into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Scorching Whirlwind
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If 1 of them is tails, discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard. If both are tails, discard all Energy cards attached to Charizard.

attacks.name: Bursting Inferno
attacks.text: Each Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Charizard & Braixen-GX

attacks.name: Brilliant Flare
attacks.text: You may search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.text: Attach 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Combustion Blast during your next turn.

attacks.text: Discard 5 Fire Energy attached to Charizard ex. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, and any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

name: Shining Charizard
rules: You can't have more than 1 Shining Charizard in your deck.

attacks.text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card and 1 Lightning Energy card attached to Shining Charizard or this attack does nothing. Flip a coin. If tails, Shining Charizard does 30 damage to itself.

flavorText: The flames it breathes are so hot that they can melt anything.
